summary: Trump has not released his tax returns, which every major-party nominee for the past 4 decades has done.

statements.quote: The President has no intention -- the President has released plenty of information and I think has given more financial disclosure than anybody else.  I think the American population has plenty of information on this.

I released the most extensive financial review of anybody in the history of politics. It's either 100 or maybe more pages of names of companies, locations of companies, et cetera, et cetera, and it's a very impressive list and everybody says that. But I released a massive list, far more than you -- you don't learn much in a tax return.

name: Donald Trump has provided more financial disclosure than anyone
